mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.org_code as "orgCode", b.name as "orgName", a.item_code as "itemCode", a.status as "status", b.status as "lastStatus", a.msg as "msg", TO_CHAR(a.credt,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "credt", TO_CHAR(a.moddt,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "moddt", a.operator as "operator" from ORG_AUDIT_LOG a inner join ORG_ORGANIZATION_INFO b on a.org_code=b.code where a.org_Code=#{orgCode} and a.item_code='0' order by a.credt desc

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_audit_log( id, org_code, item_code, status, credt, moddt ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgCode}, #{itemCode}, '0', #{credt}, #{moddt} )
mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.org_code as "orgCode", a.item_code as "itemCode", a.status as "status", a.credt as "credt", a.moddt as "moddt", b.name as "orgName", a.operator as "operator.id", c.name as "operator.name"
left join ORG_ORGANIZATION_INFO b on a.org_code=b.code left join sys_user c on a.operator=c.id
mapper.select: select a.id as "logId",a.item_code as "itemCode",a.org_code as "orgCode",a.credt as "credt", a.moddt as "moddt",a.status as "status",a.msg as "msg",b.id as "attachId", b.file_path as "filePath",b.save_file_name as "saveFileName",b.suffix as "suffix" from ORG_AUDIT_LOG a left join org_attachment b on a.org_code=b.org_code and a.item_code=b.item_code where a.org_code=#{orgCode} and a.credt=#{credt} and a.item_code != '0' order by a.item_code asc
